Dreadhead Parkour is a 2D run built around simple inputs and sharp obstacles. You jump, slide, and adjust in midair to thread gaps, bounce off platforms, and avoid hazards that punish sloppy timing. Levels are short and restart instantly, which puts the focus on learning patterns and carrying clean movement from one challenge to the next.

Moment to moment you’re committing early—jump now to catch the apex—or waiting a beat to let a threat pass. Progress comes from rhythm more than speed, and the satisfaction lives in a perfect section that used to look impossible. It’s approachable, quick, and tuned for those small got it moments.

Burrito Bison is a launch‑and‑bounce game where distance comes from smart timing and messy collisions. Each run begins with a powerful throw, then you keep speed by slamming into gummy opponents and chaining hits without dropping momentum. Obstacles, gates, and brief slowdowns force you to read the road and decide when to use a heavy slam or save a boost for a cleaner section ahead.

The loop is short and satisfying: push a little farther, earn currency, and invest in upgrades that make the next attempt more stable. Moment to moment you’re watching arcs, nudging the angle to catch a high‑value target, and choosing whether to burn a special ability to rescue a sagging run. The challenge is consistency rather than perfection, and small improvements add up until long, flowing chains become normal.

It’s bright and playful, but it rewards attention. Runs feel better when you manage pacing—holding off on a slam to keep a combo alive, or spending at the right time to break through a barrier. Progression isn’t only about raw power; it’s learning to spot good lines and avoiding stalls that kill speed. That mix keeps retries engaging, turning a minute into a series of fun, measurable gains.

House of Hazards is a hilarious multiplayer game where completing simple household chores becomes a chaotic challenge. Players take turns trying to finish tasks like making coffee or watering plants, while the others set off traps to stop them. Watch out for falling lamps, flying toast, and slippery floors!

The game is perfect for playing with friends, offering plenty of laughs as you sabotage each other’s efforts. With its quirky art style and unpredictable gameplay, House of Hazards turns mundane activities into a competitive and entertaining battle for survival.

Iron Snout is a fast-paced fighting game where you play as a ninja pig defending against waves of wolves. Using simple controls, you can punch, kick, and flip to defeat enemies attacking from all sides. You can even catch weapons thrown at you and use them against your attackers.

The combat is fluid and satisfying, with hilarious animations and brutal takedowns. As you survive longer, the waves get more intense, introducing new enemy types and hazards. It’s an addictive brawler that tests your reflexes and timing.

Mad Day is an action-packed driving game where you battle alien invaders to rescue your beloved pet octopus. Drive, shoot, and jump your way through hordes of enemies in this explosive adventure.

The game features a variety of vehicles, weapons, and upgrades. Customize your ride and unleash chaos on the alien forces in this fun and addictive game.

Murder is a funny assassination game where you try to eliminate the king and take his place. Sneak up behind the monarch and strike when he's not looking, but be careful not to get caught!

Once you become the king, you must watch your own back as others will try to assassinate you. React quickly to catch potential killers and throw them into the dungeon. How long can you hold onto the throne?

Striker Dummies is a fighting game where you control wooden dummies battling it out with giant hammers. Swing your weapon, dodge attacks, and try to smash your opponent into pieces.

The game features simple controls but intense combat. Play against the AI or challenge a friend in two-player mode. Who will be the last dummy standing?

SuperBattle 2 is a competitive two-player game with a collection of minigames. Challenge your friend on the same device in various modes like soccer, racing, and tank battles.

The game features simple one-button controls and colorful graphics. It's perfect for quick matches and settling rivalries. Choose your favorite minigame and see who is the superior player.

Tag is a multiplayer game of catch! Play with friends or against the computer in various arenas. Run, jump, and slide to avoid being 'it' or chase down your opponents to pass the tag.

The game features simple controls and fast-paced action. Use the environment to your advantage, hide behind obstacles, and outsmart your friends in this classic playground game.
